import { useState } from "react"; import quizData from "../assets/quizData.json" const Question = () => { let [index, setIndex] = useState(0); let[question, setQuestion] = useState(quizData[index]); return ( <>

Question {index+1} of {question.subject.length}

{question.questions[0].question}

A

{question.questions[0].options[0]}

B

3:1

A

2.5:1

A

5:1

) } export default Question;
